Habitat: Underdark, Urban; Treasure: Any
Ghosts arise when living creatures die in a state of extreme emotion or
having left an important task undone. These incorporeal spirits haunt
locations that are meaningful to them, lingering until their business is
complete or they’re put to rest.
Ghosts typically appear as semitransparent versions of the creatures they
were in life, though some bear evidence of the wounds that killed them or
have nightmarish distortions to their forms. Many have extreme reactions to
actions, objects, or individuals that remind them of emotionally charged
aspects of their lives. Particularly desperate or vengeful ghosts might
possess the living to fulfill their ends.
